meanings.definition: A soft, high-pitched sound made by a cat.
meanings.sent1: The meou of the kitten was so gentle and sweet.
meanings.sent2: I heard the meou of the cat outside my window.
meanings.sent3: The meou of the cat seemed to say, 'I'm hungry!'
meanings.sent4: The meou of the cat floated through the night like a melody.
meanings.sent5: The meou echoed in the empty alley, haunting and lonely.

meanings.definition: To make a soft, high-pitched sound like a cat.
meanings.sent1: She tried to meou like a cat but ended up giggling instead.
meanings.sent2: The kitten started to meou when it saw its favorite toy.
meanings.sent3: He meoued playfully to get his friend's attention.
meanings.sent4: The wind made the branches meou softly in the night.
meanings.sent5: The singer's voice meoued beautifully, captivating the audience.

meanings.definition: A vocalization made by a cat to communicate.
meanings.sent1: The meou of the cat told me it wanted to go outside.
meanings.sent2: I always pay attention to my cat's meou to understand its needs.
meanings.sent3: The cat's meou seemed to ask, 'Where is my food?'
meanings.sent4: The meou of the cat was like a secret code between us.
meanings.sent5: The meou of the cat was filled with urgency, demanding attention.
